name: MyQuu
overview:
Almost every household and every driver listens to the radio at one point during every day. Radio personalities, artists and retailers communicate and build relationships with their audience through songs, advertisements and product promotions. And up until now, the only way to gain feedback was through the phone or in-person store visits.

myQuu recognized there could be more interaction and created a personalized and free radio content service that allows listeners to immediately select, and interact with fun and meaningful radio content online, while advertisers effectively reach their target audience with click-to-call capabilities. myQuu is creating practical and fulfilling radio experience for listeners and advertisers!

Listeners are able to interact with music, advertising, contests, requests, polls, and donations, as well as share and discuss favorite music and bands with each other.
